revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife}} '''A_Explode512'''
(no parameters)
Performs a radius attack with 512 damage and a 512 radius, sets the extra light of the target to 5 (similar to calling [[A_Light]](5)), and changes the {{Property|RenderStyle}} to Add.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|PowerCrystal}} and derived classes.
